feature_name: Truthful home positioning and client-side scaffold preview
scope_summary: Update homepage messaging to accurately state build/private-beta status, remove implied live/trial positioning, and add a no-login, no-storage scaffold preview generator that runs fully client-side.

legal_and_regulatory.rationale: Copy now avoids misleading availability claims and explicitly marks preview status.
evidence: index.html hero/status copy updated to active development + private beta

privacy_local_first_promise.rationale: Preview tool runs in-browser only and does not persist or transmit user input.
evidence: Index disclaimer states nothing entered is saved

medical_scope_and_claims.rationale: Language remains productivity-focused without diagnosis/treatment claims.
evidence: No medical claims added in homepage copy

behavioral_science_alignment.rationale: Preview scaffolds reduce activation friction via small-step framing and energy-adaptive pacing.
evidence: Step generation adapts chunk sizes and break frequency by energy

neurodivergence_research_alignment.rationale: Copy and preview model cognitive load and variable capacity instead of enforcing rigid productivity norms.
evidence: Definition of zig and anchor/scaffold framing added
Energy and mood selectors shape output

user_benefit_and_harm_check.rationale: Users get an honest status update and a usable interactive demo without signup or data risk.
evidence: Two explicit CTAs: early access and preview tool

brand_voice_and_claims.rationale: Voice is direct and concrete with full tagline and explicit status claims.

accessibility_and_inclusion.rationale: Inputs are labeled, contrast remains theme-compliant, and interaction works with standard controls.

security_and_reliability.rationale: Static asset additions only; new local paths validated with HTTP 200 checks.
evidence: index/assets/partials paths tested locally with no 404s

monetization_and_dark_pattern_check.rationale: No monetization flow added; CTAs are transparent and non-coercive.
evidence: Early access CTA points to contact route
Preview CTA is free, no-login utility

ship_decision.conditions: Deploy and verify homepage renders new copy and scaffold preview tool without missing assets.
